cz.ive.iveobject
Class ObjectClassTree

java.lang.Object
  cz.ive.iveobject.ObjectClassTree
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ObjectClassTree
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Singlton containing Tree and Map of ObjectClasses for easy saving and loading. Object classes are identified by their String id which is set of tokens separated by ObjectClass.SEP ("/") and starting by this separator. One exception is a root ObjectClass which is represented by empty id and which (in sense of inclusion) contains all other object classes.

Author:
ondra
See Also:

emptyInstance

public static void emptyInstance()
Empty whole the ObjectClassTree before the XML load. We just drop the singleton and create a new one.
